articles.author: Juan Perez Jr., Nick Niedzwiadek, Bianca Quilantan
articles.title: The Education Department gave another agency power to distribute money. It hasn’t gone smoothly. - Politico
articles.description: Critics say issues with accessing federal career and technical education funding could preview bigger problems when the Trump administration starts to outsource more of the Education Department’s responsibilities to other agencies.
articles.content: Now state education leaders, Democratic lawmakers and former Biden administration officials say recent issues with distributing funds are likely a preview of bigger problems that could unfold when th… [+7316 chars]

articles.title: “Go generate a bridge and jump off it”: How video pros are navigating AI - Ars Technica
articles.description: I talked with nine creators about economic pressures and fan backlash.
